content.rendered:
Services of Yoga Center

Yoga Center services provide the religious programs about major branches of Yoga/Spiritual Practices specifically Bhakti Yoga to practice regularly at the Yoga Center, including Meditation Hall and Individual Meditation Kutirs. Not all but some of these Bhakti Yoga related programs are as follows:

  • Our Tradition
  • Practicing Rules & Methods
  • Spiritual Practices
  • Specific Steps of Sadhana
  • Media Gallery

Registration Information:

For more information about the Services of Yoga Center and to join its services please fill out the following form to register with fee of $65.00:

Services of Yoga Center Online Form

Services of Yoga Center PDF Form

In addition, the following programs’ registration forms of GEOKC are most learning programs forms and must join for specific reason. Please check the desired program (you can select more than one) and submit with the payment information. You will be directed soon to join the devotional program(s) you’re interested in to start the journey you deserve.

If you like to join more programs or services of GEOKC, please click on the following link:

Program Information to fill out Programs Registration Forms

Program Hours:
Weekdays : 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
Weekends & Holidays: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM and 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM

Few knowledgeable programs which are based on Bhakti Yoga are very useful and full of creativity and talent of devotional music, selflessness, to help humanity, and love of God through servant-sentiments that includes some unique activities of Bhakti Yoga to devote time. Besides some programs are created to popularize the name of GEOKC and for the expansion of its geography including the art of a specific Bhakti style (a new Kirtan style – Nama Kirtan or Lila Kirtan offered by GEOKC Kirtan Heritage and besides other expressions of Bhakti that can be in touch with the name, form or Lilas of Lord Krishna) and the influence of Gita (via spreading the message of Lord Krishna which bring a great change and support us to locate its branches internationally) to devote time with us. The names of all these programs are as follows:

GEOKC Devotional Music – GEOKC Traditional Bhajans, GEOKC Kirtan Heritage
Services of Padasevana (Padasevana for the service of His feet)
Services of Dasya (cultivating the Bhava of a servant with God)
GEOKC Shri Krishna Murari Bhakti Moment
GEOKC Shrimad Bhagavad-Gita Satsang Group
